messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2258......income
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/17/2002 10:59:25 PM Central Daylight Time, ... That is very true........It raises the tax bracket too.... Hubby had a part time job over 6
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/17/2002 10:59:25 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Right, and many can't survive on two incomes -- one income pays the taxes on
> everything; the other supports the family. It's the taxes that we can't
> survive.
>
> Ned Vare
>

That is very true........It raises the tax bracket too....

Hubby had a part time job over 6 years ago....When we went to file
taxes....we were shocked....He had claimed 0 dependents on his w4's and we
still had to pay back.............. I would have hated to see if he had of
claim dependents.....

Kim


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
